I don't know of any spectral sky models that have undergone rigorous validation from measurements.  There is a newer model by Hosek & Wilkie that improves upon some weak points of the Utah sky model published in TOG (2012):


	http://cgg.mff.cuni.cz/projects/SkylightModelling/HosekWilkie_SkylightModel_SIGGRAPH2012_Preprint_lowres.pdf


Cheers,
-Greg
